body_html: Yes, that's right. To use XLA, you need to build Tensorflow from source and enable XLA at configure time. XLA is still experimental and it's not ready to be enabled by default just yet. But feel free to try it out!
body_text: Yes, that's right. To use XLA, you need to build Tensorflow from source and enable XLA at configure time. XLA is still experimental and it's not ready to be enabled by default just yet. But feel free to try it out!
body: Yes, that's right. To use XLA, you need to build Tensorflow from source and enable XLA at configure time. XLA is still experimental and it's not ready to be enabled by default just yet. But feel free to try it out!
